name: Saddest man
description:
I have no fucking idea how to do anything. here's a little thing I just threw together. I don't even know if you can play it. you could leave ideas and suggestions for new maps and story to the game, if you would want this to be an entire one. I might just leave it on the shelf, 'cause i'm often lazy and often don't finnish what I prepare. anyways, try to test it and help me if you want. thank you for being here.

walk with arrows or wasd

interact by walking into things (sometimes you need to walk back before walking towards it to trigger the dialog box)

avoid walking into objects if you don't wanna read the dialouge.

press z to conitnue.

:3
